Item.name: A+ Blood Pack
Item.Descripition: Give your heart A+ blood, hopefully it can help you a bit. This is a minimal Blood Potion. Take this in order to restore some of the players blood. You can have an unlimited amount of these in your inventory.

Item.name: B+ Blood Pack
Item.Descripition: Give your heart B+ blood, hopefully you are compatible right? This is a average Blood Potion. It will restore a bit more of the players blood. You can have an unlimited amount of these in your inventory.

Item.name: AB+ Blood Pack
Item.Descripition: Give your heart AB+ blood, this should be more compatible, which means more blood for you. This is a strong Blood Potion. It will restore a lot more of the players blood. You can have an unlimited amount of these in your inventory.

Item.name: 0- Blood Pack
Item.Descripition: Give your hear 0- blood. If you arenâ€™t compatible with this then good luck. This is the strongest Blood potion. It will restore a huge amount of the players blood. You can have and unlimited amount of these in your inventory.

Item.name: Pheromone
Item.Descripition: Give you heart some pheromone, it should help you restore some love when you are low. This is a minimal Love Potion.Take this in order to restore some of the players love. You can have and unlimited amount of these in your inventory.

Item.name: Love Molecule
Item.Descripition: Drop some love molecule into your system, it should bring you some more love. This is a average Love Potion. It will restore a bit more of the players love. You can have and unlimited amount of these in your inventory.

Item.name: Love Dust
Item.Descripition: Sprinkle some love dust over yourself, it should help with that low love count. This is a strong Love Potion. It will restore a lot more of the players love. You can have and unlimited amount of these in your inventory.

Item.name: Love Potion #9
Item.Descripition: Love Potion #9, the strongest of all love potions, enjoy. This is the strongest Love Potion. It will restore a huge amount of the players love. You can have and unlimited amount of these in your inventory.

Item.name: Heart Pump
Item.Descripition: Get your heart pumping. This will cause a short amount of increase to the players strength, it will last for 6 minutes. You can have and unlimited amount of these in your inventory.

Item.name: Air Kiss
Item.Descripition: Take a kiss out of a bottle. This will cause a short amount of increase to the players intelligence, it will last for 6 minutes. You can have and unlimited amount of these in your inventory.

Item.name: Adrenaline
Item.Descripition: Increase your adrenaline in a life and death situation. This will cause a short amount of increase to the players dexterity, it will last for 6 minutes. You can have and unlimited amount of these in your inventory.

Item.name: Nutrition Pill
Item.Descripition: Take some quick nutrition pill to help yourself keep going. This will cause a short amount of increase to the players luck, it will last for 6 minutes. You can have and unlimited amount of these in your inventory.

Item.name: Liquid Eruption
Item.Descripition: Instant anger issues. This will cause a large increase to the players strength, it will last for 3 minutes. You can have and unlimited amount of these in your inventory.

Item.name: Full Kiss
Item.Descripition: A full blown kiss in a bottle. This will cause a large increase to the players intelligence, it will last 3 minutes. You can have and unlimited amount of these in your inventory.

Item.name: Epinephrine Pill
Item.Descripition: Pure adrenaline in a pill form. This will cause a large increase to the players dexterity, it will last 3 minutes. You can have and unlimited amount of these in your inventory.

Item.name: Heart Armor
Item.Descripition: Obtain some armor to protect your heart. This will cause a large increase to the players luck, it will last 3 minutes. You can have and unlimited amount of these in your inventory.

Item.name: Power Kiss
Item.Descripition: A super strong kiss in a bottle. Once used it will cause a huge increase in both strength and intelligence, it will last 2 minutes. You can have and unlimited amount of these in your inventory.

Item.name: Love Armor
Item.Descripition: Armor in a bottle made to protect your heart, yet light enough to get you going. Once used it will cause a huge increase in both strength and intelligence, it will last 2 minutes. You can have and unlimited amount of these in your inventory.

Item.name: Loss
Item.Descripition: Said to be one of the first Magic Keys. It appears to the wielder at times of great morning.

Item.name: Remorse
Item.Descripition: A Magic Key used less for attacking and more for magic. As the name says it was made in order not to commit much violence.

Item.name: Sadness
Item.Descripition: Though the name is miss leading this Magic Key is very resourceful.

Item.name: Misery
Item.Descripition: A Magic Key said to cause misery on opponents.

Item.name: Bitternes
Item.Descripition: Take out a bit of your anger on enemies with this Magic Key.

Item.name: Longing
Item.Descripition: A Magic Key said to have lingering effects on its weilder.

Item.name: Neediness
Item.Descripition: A Magic Key with a long reach.

Item.name: Sorrow
Item.Descripition: One of the saddest looking Magic Keys.

Item.name: Loneliness
Item.Descripition: A Magic Key made for lone wolves.

Item.name: Discontent
Item.Descripition: A Magic Key with its pieces magically connected.

Item.name: Glad
Item.Descripition: This Magic Key although not strong is said to have a nice aura around it.

Item.name: Hostility
Item.Descripition: Rumored to be a self aware Magic Key.

Item.name: Happiness
Item.Descripition: The most balanced of all the Magic Keys

Item.name: Rage
Item.Descripition: This Magic Key is the embodiment of anger. Use it wisely, and safely.

Item.name: Hope
Item.Descripition: A magic Key said to have a distinct glow to it.

Item.name: Passion
Item.Descripition: With this Magic key you should be able to make yourself stronger.

Item.name: Attraction
Item.Descripition: With this Magic Key you should be able to increase your connection with love.

Item.name: Triumph
Item.Descripition: The strongest of all the Magic Keys in existence. With this you may be able to defeat any foe.

Item.name: Sandels
Item.Descripition: A pair of shoes, made out of leather. Said not to be too protective.

Item.name: Leather Gloves
Item.Descripition: A pair of gloves made out of leather. Said not to be too protective.

Item.name: Leather Strap
Item.Descripition: A strap made out of leather. Said not to be too protective.

Item.name: Bronze Shoes
Item.Descripition: A pair of shoes made out of bronze. Said to be protective, but not too durable.

Item.name: Bronze Gloves
Item.Descripition: A pair of gloves made out of bronze. Said to be protective, but not too durable.

Item.name: Bronze Strap
Item.Descripition: A strap made out of bronze. Said to be protective, but not too durable.

Item.name: Iron Shoes
Item.Descripition: A pair of shoes made out of iron. Protective & Durable.

Item.name: Iron Gloves
Item.Descripition: A pair of gloves made out of iron. Protective & Durable.

Item.name: Iron Strap
Item.Descripition: A strap made out of iron. Protective & Durable.

Item.name: Steel Shoes
Item.Descripition: A pair of shoes made ouf of steel. The most protective of all the metal equipments.

Item.name: Steel Gloves
Item.Descripition: A pair of gloves made out of steel. The most protective of all the metal equipments.

Item.name: Steel Strap
Item.Descripition: A strap made out of steel. The most protective of all the metal equipments.

Item.name: Blood Shoes
Item.Descripition: A pair of shoes, infused with the blood of an unknown source. Rumored to increase your strength.

Item.name: Blood Gloves
Item.Descripition: A pair of gloves, infused with the blood of an unknown source. Rumored to increase your strength.

Item.name: Blood Strap
Item.Descripition: A strap, infused with the blood of an unknown source. Rumored to increase your strength.

Item.name: Love Shoes
Item.Descripition: A pair of shoes, infused with love from an unknown source. Rumored to increase your intelligence.

Item.name: Love Gloves
Item.Descripition: A pair of gloves, infused with love from an unknown source. Rumored to increase your intelligence.

Item.name: Love Strap
Item.Descripition: A strap, infused with the love from an unknown source. Rumored to increase your intelligence.

Item.name: Unlock Inventory Slot
Item.Descripition: Use this in order to unlock Inventory Slots. There is only a select few of these in stock.

Item.name: Unlock Equipment Slot
Item.Descripition: Use this in order to unlock Equipment Slots. There is only a select few of these in stock.

Item.name: Age Boost 1
Item.Descripition: Slight increases the players age permanently. There is only a select few of these in stock.

Item.name: Age Boost 2
Item.Descripition: Increase the players age permanently. There is only a select few of these in stock.

Item.name: Age Boost 3
Item.Descripition: Greatly increase the players age permanently. There is only a select few of these in stock.

Item.name: Age Boost 4
Item.Descripition: Hugely increase the players age permanently. There is only a select few of these in stock.

Item.name: Blood Boost 1
Item.Descripition: Slight increases the players health permanently. There is only a select few of these in stock.

Item.name: Blood Boost 2
Item.Descripition: Increase the players health permanently. There is only a select few of these in stock.

Item.name: Love Boost 1
Item.Descripition: Slight increases the players love permanently. There is only a select few of these in stock.

Item.name: Love Boost 2
Item.Descripition: Increase the players love permanently. There is only a select few of these in stock.

Item.name: Strength Boost 1
Item.Descripition: Slight increases the players strength permanently. There is only a select few of these in stock.

Item.name: Strength Boost 2
Item.Descripition: Increase the players strength permanently. There is only a select few of these in stock.

Item.name: Intelligence Boost 1
Item.Descripition: Slight increases the players intelligence permanently. There is only a select few of these in stock.

Item.name: Intelligence Boost 2
Item.Descripition: Increase the players intelligence permanently. There is only a select few of these in stock.

Item.name: Dexterity Boost 1
Item.Descripition: Slight increases the players dexterity permanently. There is only a select few of these in stock.

Item.name: Dexterity Boost 2
Item.Descripition: Increase the players dexterity permanently. There is only a select few of these in stock.

Item.name: Luck Boost 1
Item.Descripition: Slight increases the players luck permanently. There is only a select few of these in stock.

Item.name: Luck Boost 2
Item.Descripition: Increase the players luck permanently. There is only a select few of these in stock.
